description: {DThe tunnel you find yourself inside, is very dark, and damp. It is
probably somewhere under the oceans of Baldur's Gate, because of the
damp smell,  and the occasional dripping of water.  The tunnel seems
to go on and on forever to the north and south.{x

55971.name: {gUnder The {bT{Be{Dm{rp{Dl{be {gOf {bU{Bm{Db{rer{Dl{Be{be{x
description: {bAll around are the misty, dark waters of Baldur's Gate harbour.
It is very dark and the currents are strong,  pulling you in all
sorts of different directions.  Up above, the faint light of the
temple of umberlee can be seen. Just off in the distance through
the  dark murky  waters,  it is possible  to make out what looks
like pillars that act as support columns for the temple above.{x

description: {cAt the far  south of the  Temple of Umberlee,  a narrow
jetty runs along the south wall.  Several portholes  look
out onto the  Sea of Swords,  and it is often possible to

{cThe priestess is a tall muscular woman, showing great strength for
a woman.  She is wearing scalemail armor that has been intricately
moulded to look like crashing waves.  She bears the symbol of
Umberlee, the Bitch Queen, godess of the oceans, waves and sea travel.
{x
